name: Yogurt Cucumber Relish
keywords: coriander, cucumber, yogurt, raw, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 small clove garlic, minced very fine
1 quarter cup fresh coriander leaves, chopped coarse

recipeInstructions.text: Peel cucumbers, cut them in half lengthwise, scrape out the seeds and cut the halves crosswise into 1/8-inch slices. Put slices in a bowl and mix with salt. Allow to stand 10 minutes. Empty slices into a colander and press them to remove excess moisture.
Combine cucumber slices with yogurt, garlic and coriander. Season to taste with salt and serve as a side dish with the tabbouleh.
